name: Laureate Digital Teaching and Learning
description:
Digital technologies are changing higher education around the globe. Students expect the flexibility, personalization, and connectedness that online and blended courses offer. Also, employers want graduates who are proficient with technology and who can collaborate at a distance.
 Whether you are new to teaching online, would like to create your own online or blended courses, or want to update your technology skills and knowledge, you can benefit from this exciting professional development opportunity from Laureate

pathways.name: Introduction to Online Learning
pathways.description: We know the transition to digital teaching can be challenging, so we've collected resources that other teachers like you have found helpful. Whether you are new to teaching or a seasoned verteran you can feel supported bringing your classes online.
pathways.introduction: The Digital Teaching and Program offers 22 self-paced modules and 6 badges. Each badge features interactive activities and downloadable job aids in an easy-to-navigate online environment.
